about you

At Switch MSP We Mitigate Business Risks Through Managed IT Services

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”0.0.0.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” background_last_edited=”on|phone” use_background_color_gradient_tablet=”on” background_color_gradient_start_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” background_color_gradient_end_tablet=”rgba(255,255,255,0.76)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image_tablet=”on” background_position_phone=”top_right” fb_built=”1″ _i=”1″ _address=”1″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.0.0.0″]

Our Process-Driven Managed Services Partnership Delivers Outcomes, Every Time

Small and medium businesses are facing bigger and more complex technology challenges than ever before. For most, technology has become an integral and critical aspect of their business. How do you implement and maintain your technology solutions with the fit-for-purpose managed IT services? That’s where we come in! 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/managed-services/” button_text=”FREE assessment” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.0.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.0.1″][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ hover_enabled=”0″ _i=”1″ _address=”1.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”1.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”73%” width_tablet=”96%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” _i=”0″ _address=”1.1.0.0″]

Talk to our team about creating a tailored, cost-effective IT package to mitigate the risks for your business.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ next_background_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”||22px|||” top_divider_flip=”vertical” bottom_divider_style=”ramp” bottom_divider_height=”100%” fb_built=”1″ _i=”2″ _address=”2″][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-companies-in-auckland.jpg” alt=”it companies in auckland” title_text=”it companies in auckland” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.0.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”2.0.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_2_text_color=”#77b856″ custom_margin=”73px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”2.0.1.0″]

Mitigate business risks through unique, process-driven managed IT services 

Technology keeps your business operational and productive. Any potential issues in your IT environment present risks for your business that could result in disruptions and your business incurring huge costs. The Switch MSP team can implement process-driven managed IT services so you can effectively mitigate business risks.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”2.0.1.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”8px||8px|||” fb_built=”1″ _i=”3″ _address=”3″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”|auto|19px|auto||” _i=”0″ _address=”3.0″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_color=”#58585a” custom_margin=”82px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.0.0″]

Achieve outcomes through a strategic business partnership

Aligning good business plans with sound technology requires a solid partnership. That’s why we refer to our clients as “Partners”. Your dedicated virtual CIO, or virtual chief information officer, will meet with you regularly to help you create your strategic technology roadmap and budgets.  You can be confident that through our strategic business partnership you will achieve your expected outcomes.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”3.0.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-company-whangarei-.jpg” alt=”it company whangarei ” title_text=”it company whangarei ” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#77b856″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.0.1.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”|auto|17px|auto||” _i=”1″ _address=”3.1″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”3.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”74%” width_tablet=”97%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment=”center” _i=”0″ _address=”3.1.0.0″]

We have the infrastructure and specialists to make it happen in Auckland and Whangarei without you having the expense of building an in-house IT and services department.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#77b856″ background_enable_image=”off” background_size=”contain” background_position=”top_right” custom_padding=”53px||53px||true|” top_divider_style=”ramp” top_divider_color=”#ffffff” top_divider_height=”100%” top_divider_flip=”vertical” bottom_divider_height=”100%” bottom_divider_flip=”vertical” fb_built=”1″ _i=”4″ _address=”4″][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”4.0″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”4.0.0″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-near-me.jpg” alt=”it services near me” title_text=”it services near me” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ border_radii=”on|500px|500px|500px|500px” border_width_all=”17px” border_color_all=”#ffffff” _i=”0″ _address=”4.0.0.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”4.0.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_color=”#58585a” header_2_text_color=”#58585a” custom_margin=”55px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”4.0.1.0″]

Improve profitability by minimising your true IT costs 

IT issues cost, sometimes a lot. The biggest cost is not necessarily what it takes to rectify the “issues”, but the productivity loss and other business impacts such as data loss or damage to your reputation. When you mitigate the business risks of your IT environment, you effectively minimise your true IT costs and improve business profitability.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/it-support/” button_text=”contact us” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_use_icon=”off” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_duration=”1450ms” animation_delay=”350ms” animation_intensity_slide=”9%” _i=”1″ _address=”4.0.1.1″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#58585a” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#58585a”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”services” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”||16px|||” custom_padding=”||20px|||” fb_built=”1″ _i=”5″ _address=”5″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”7px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”5.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”5.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font_size=”50px” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”5.0.0.0″]

service offerings

Technology Solutions Designed for Your Business

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”96%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” _i=”1″ _address=”5.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”5.1.0″][et_pb_blurb title=”Managed Services – Tech Alignment” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-outsourcing.png” alt=”it outsourcing” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-114″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.1.0.0″]

 We blend business acumen with technical expertise. Our managed IT services will align your technology environment and business strategies with your organisational objectives.

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”5.1.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Cybersecurity” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/business-it-solutions.png” alt=”business it solutions” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_delay=”250ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-1618″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.1.1.0″]

Identifying cybersecurity risks and implementing thorough security plans and regular reviews will protect your valuable digital assets. 

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”2″ _address=”5.1.2″][et_pb_blurb title=”Cloud Computing” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/northland-it-solutions.png” alt=”northland it solutions” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_delay=”500ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-1634″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.1.2.0″]

Scale your IT environment with a cloud computing strategy tailored for your business. You’ll reduce your costs and improve business flexibility and efficiency.

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ width=”96%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” _i=”2″ _address=”5.2″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”5.2.0″][et_pb_blurb title=”Technology Consulting” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-whangarei.png” alt=”it whangarei” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_delay=”750ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-1625″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.2.0.0″]

Together we’ll work to understand your business and then we’ll recommend the best solutions to improve the reliability, functionality and efficiency of your organisation.

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”1″ _address=”5.2.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Technology Coaching” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/computer-support.png” alt=”computer support” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_delay=”1000ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-1638″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.2.1.0″]

Custom technology coaching courses lift staff confidence and enhance productivity. We can work with your team to improve security awareness and help them make best use of a variety of software applications.

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”2″ _address=”5.2.2″][et_pb_blurb title=”Backup & Data Recovery” image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/computer-technician.png” image_max_width=”40%” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”23px” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1400ms” animation_delay=”1250ms” link_option_url=”#divi-sos-1629″ transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”116%|116%” _i=”0″ _address=”5.2.2.0″]

Prevent data loss in case of disasters or security breach. Robust systems ensure a quick and full recovery of your data, saving you time, money, and potentially your business!

learn more >

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”4px||29px|||” fb_built=”1″ _i=”6″ _address=”6″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_margin=”5px|auto||auto|false|false” _i=”0″ _address=”6.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”6.0.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_orientation=”center” _i=”0″ _address=”6.0.0.0″]

Need to make IT work for your Auckland or Whangarei business?

Call us on 0800-24-7-24-8 or email ask@switchmsp.co.nz today.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#58585a” background_image=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/it-services-for-business.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”bottom_right” custom_padding=”31px||29px|||” global_module=”1667″ fb_built=”1″ _i=”7″ _address=”7″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px|||||” _i=”0″ _address=”7.0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”7.0.0″][et_pb_image src=”https://switchmsp.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/switch-msp-dark.jpg” alt=”Switch MSP” title_text=”Switch MSP” align=”center” align_tablet=”left” align_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ max_width=”21%” max_width_tablet=”39%” max_width_phone=”48%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_tablet=”|||-24px|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”|||-15px|false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” _i=”0″ _address=”7.0.0.0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ custom_padding=”6px||9px|||” _i=”1″ _address=”7.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″ _i=”0″ _address=”7.1.0″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.29.3″ text_text_color=”#c8c9ca” header_4_text_color=”#c8c9ca” _i=”0″ _address=”7.1.0.0″]
